name: Mozilla Firefox
desc: Mozilla Firefox, or simply Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, the Mozilla Corporation.

name: Google Chrome
desc: Google Chrome is a cross-platform web browser developed by Google. It was first released in 2008 for Microsoft Windows, built with free software components from Apple WebKit and Mozilla Firefox.

name: Microsoft Edge
desc: Microsoft Edge is a proprietary cross-platform web browser created by Microsoft. It was first released in 2015, as part of Windows 10 and Xbox One.
